players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Diana was found dead.
Bob: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Charlie knows I'm detective, so they might lie. Vote Charlie."
You: "Bob, thanks for the info. I trust your investigation. Charlie is mafia. Vote him."
Bob: "I know Charlie is mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he'll lie. No evidence for Alice or me. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
